summary: The bill, titled the "Financial Opportunities for Retirees and Warriors Advancing Retirement Development Act" (FORWARD Act), amends Title 5 of the United States Code to allow retired or certain disabled members of the uniformed services to contribute to the Thrift Savings Plan (TSP) after separation. It specifies eligibility criteria, contribution guidelines, and mandates the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board, in coordination with the Department of Defense and Department of Veterans Affairs, to issue regulations to implement the Act.
